data.title: Apple needs to raise prices to offset possible tariffs: JPM
data.text: Yahoo Finance's Seana Smith and Dan Howley report on JPMorgan's estimates that Apple would have to raise prices by 14 percent to offset costs due to tariffs.

data.title: Apple is the 'poster child' for trade tensions and if its stock bounces, so could market

data.title: Apple's stock rallies after BofA Merrill Lynch sees a 'particularly attractive' opportunity to buy

data.title: Apple's Buybacks Provide Strong Long-Term Upside
data.text: Apple's capital return program is unique. Apple has returned 95% of its Free Cash Flow since the dividend and share repurchase program began six and a half years ago.

data.title: You want to own defensive companies with good balance sheets like Apple, says Pimco's Erin Browne
data.text: Erin Browne, Pimco managing director and portfolio manager, joins 'Fast Money Halftime Report' to discuss markets amid the trade war fallout and what impact it could have on the market.

data.title: Why Apple Stock Is Still One of the Best Investments
data.text: Apple stock is one of the strongest investments out there and Monday's action doesn't change that fact. If not for tariffs, we'd be talking about setting new highs.

data.title: Apple's having a really bad week
data.text: A Supreme Court ruling opens Apple up for antitrust lawsuits and the escalating trade war with China potentially exposes the company's international revenue.

data.title: Apple would need to raise iPhone prices significantly to offset new tariffs, analysts say
data.text: If President Trump decides to slap tariffs of the remaining billions of dollars worth of Chinese goods, iPhone prices will need to go higher.

data.title: Supreme Court Says iPhone Users Could Sue Apple Over App Store: What To Know
data.text: The U.S. Supreme Court ruled in a 5-4 decision Monday that a group of Apple Inc. users can sue the iPhone maker for monopolistic behavior.

data.title: Apple's new Powerbeats Pro headphones are better than AirPods
data.text: The Powerbeats Pro are a great alternative to AirPods, but they cost $250, and the charging case is really bulky.

data.title: The last time Apple did this, it rallied 130%
data.text: Apple has fallen prey to this trade war-triggered market sell-off, but a propitious development in its charts could signal a massive rally.

data.title: Martin: A US-China trade war would hurt Apple's sales all over the world
data.text: Laura Martin of Needham & Co discusses the impact of a full-blown trade war on Apple's manufacturing and supply chain, as well as its global sales.

data.title: Shark Tank's Kevin O'Leary: Large retailers must pay attention to the Apple ruling
data.text: Dan Ives, managing director and equity analyst at Wedbush Securities, joins 'Squawk Box' to discuss the courts ruling against Apple, allowing customers to sue over app store prices.
